  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105836</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Whose Business Is It? Exploring the Business Section through a Scavenger Hunt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wer Geschäft Ist Es? Erforschen des 
Geschäft Kapitels durch eine Reiniger-Jagd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À qui Affaires Sont Il ? Explorer la 
section d'affaires par une chasse à Scavenger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De quem Negócio É Ele? Explorando a 
seção do negócio com uma caça do SCAVENGER</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Di chi Commercio È Esso? Esplorando la 
sezione di affari tramite un pulitore Cerchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιά επιχείρηση είναι; Να ερευνήσει το 
επιχειρησιακό τμήμα μέσω ενός κυνηγιού οδοκαθαριστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿De quién Negocio Es Él? Explorar la 
sección del negocio con una caza del limpiador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students consider the myriad ways in which the news reported in the Business Day section of The Times relates to their own lives and learning.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion betrachten Kursteilnehmer die 
unzähligen Methoden, in denen die Nachricht, die im Werktagkapitel 
der Zeiten geberichtet wird, auf ihren eigenen Lebensdauern und Lernen
in Verbindung steht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants considèrent les
voies innombrables dont les nouvelles enregistrées dans la section de
jour d'affaires des temps associent aux leurs propres vies et étude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes consideram as 
maneiras inumeráveis em que a notícia relatada na seção do dia de 
negócio dos tempos se relaciona a à suas próprias vidas e 
aprendizagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi considerano i modi 
innumerevoli in cui le notizie segnalate nella sezione di giorno di 
affari dei tempi si riferiscono alle a loro propri vite ed imparare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές εξετάζουν τους 
τρόπους μυριάδας με τους οποίους οι ειδήσεις που αναφέρονται στο 
τμήμα επιχειρησιακής ημέρας των χρόνων αφορούν τις ζωές και την 
εκμάθησή τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes consideran las 
maneras innumerables de las cuales las noticias señaladas en la 
sección del día laboral de los tiempos se relacionan con sus propias
vidas y aprender.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
